name: Midnight
overview: A one or two player adaptation of Clue in Italian programmed by E. Gervino and published by Systems Editoriale s.r.l. in Commodore 64 Club #05 [Italian Release] in 1988 and also in Alga Soft 1988 n.14b. Find out if it was Mr. Green in the bar with the razor or Mr. Red in the Bedroom with the scissors.
